title: 652: BITCOIN CHART FRACTAL SUGGESTS BTC PRICE WILL RALLY TO AT LEAST $80K BY SEPTEMBER!!!!!
description:
Despite Bitcoin currently trading at around $39,700 as of Aug. 2, some analysts anticipate that the BTC price can rise by another 100%.

Nunya Bizniz, an independent market analyst, posted the bullish setup on Sunday, noting that each of the cryptocurrency's previous 10-day bull runs has ended up doubling its prices at a later stage.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:author: Justin Verrengia
